body_html:
you need to install Cuda 7.5 and Cudnn 7.0 for Tensorflow 0.8, I have managed to make it work, it can be done!

For Cuda:

wget http://developer.download.nvidia.com/compute/cuda/repos/ubuntu1404/x86_64/cuda-repo-ubuntu1404_7.5-18_amd64.deb
sudo dpkg -i cuda-repo-ubuntu1404_7.5-18_amd64.deb
rm cuda-repo-ubuntu1404_7.5-18_amd64.deb
sudo apt-get update
sudo apt-get install -y cuda

For Cudnn 7.0 you need to register in Nvidia and download: https://developer.nvidia.com/rdp/assets/cudnn-70-linux-x64-v40

Then something like:
tar -zxf cudnn-7.0-linux-x64-v4.0-prod.tgz && rm cudnn-7.0-linux-x64-v4.0-prod.tgz
sudo cp -R cuda/lib64/* /usr/local/cuda-7.5/lib64
sudo cp cuda/include/cudnn.h /usr/local/cuda-7.5/include/

Good luck!
